a:5:{s:10:"categories";a:4:{i:37;s:2:"on";i:42;s:2:"on";i:39;s:2:"on";i:40;s:2:"on";}s:5:"image";a:2:{s:8:"category";s:18:"vertical_rectangle";s:7:"product";s:18:"vertical_rectangle";}s:13:"miscellaneous";a:13:{s:13:"enable_rating";s:1:"1";s:15:"enable_wishlist";s:1:"1";s:20:"enable_socialsharing";s:1:"1";s:21:"enable_discountcoupon";s:1:"1";s:20:"enable_productsearch";s:1:"1";s:20:"enable_guestcheckout";s:1:"0";s:17:"enable_outofstock";s:1:"0";s:18:"enable_fixedheader";s:1:"1";s:28:"enable_estimatedshippingcost";s:1:"0";s:21:"enable_categorywidget";s:1:"1";s:19:"enable_storelocator";s:1:"1";s:18:"enable_sociallogin";s:1:"1";s:19:"enable_image_resize";s:1:"1";}s:11:"productlist";a:9:{s:8:"showname";s:1:"1";s:9:"showprice";s:1:"1";s:10:"showrating";s:1:"1";s:10:"enablesort";s:1:"1";s:15:"default_sorting";s:10:"popularity";s:12:"default_view";s:4:"list";s:15:"persistent_view";s:1:"1";s:23:"enablechangeproductview";s:1:"1";s:12:"enablefilter";s:1:"1";}s:13:"productdetail";a:4:{s:18:"enable_productzoom";s:1:"1";s:21:"enable_endless_slider";s:1:"0";s:24:"enable_youmaylike_slider";s:1:"1";s:13:"showattribute";a:0:{}}}
